name: malsouka tajine
steps: Cook the ground meat with oil, salt, pepper, turmeric, and chopped onion (if used).
Mix the cooked meat with grated cheese, ricotta, the 6 raw eggs, and the chopped hard-boiled eggs. Season to taste.
Butter the mold (Pyrex type or tart mold). Soak the brick sheets with oil or melted butter.
Line the mold with the soaked brick sheets, leaving some overhanging. Place sheets in the center to reinforce the base.
Fold over the overhanging brick sheets to close the tajine.
Cover the mold with a sheet in the center and glaze with an egg yolk (optional).
Place the preparation in the oven and bake for 30 minutes at 180Â°C.
